Sentencas: Chemical interactions at the phase boundaries of materials applied for the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) have been studied by EPMA.
Titulo: EPMA OF INTERFACES APPLIED TO THE SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL

Sentencas: The chemical reactivity at the interface of Lay-xSrxMnO3/ZrO2-Y2O3 is dependent on the stoichiometry (y) and the Sr content (x) of the perovskite.
Titulo: EPMA OF INTERFACES APPLIED TO THE SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL

Sentencas: Typical reaction products (zirconates) and a diffusion zone in the ZrO2-Y2O3 have been observed.
Titulo: EPMA OF INTERFACES APPLIED TO THE SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL

Sentencas: The extension of cation release (Mn) is related to the increasing chemical activity of Mn oxide in the perovskite by the Sr substitution for La.
Titulo: EPMA OF INTERFACES APPLIED TO THE SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL

Sentencas: The wettability of the metal/oxide interface in the anode cermet (Ni/ZrO2-Y2O3) has been found to be influenced by chemical reactions resulting from the applied reducing atmosphere with high carbon activity.
Titulo: EPMA OF INTERFACES APPLIED TO THE SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL

Sentencas: The disintegration of ZrO2-Y2O3 in contact with molten Ni or Ni-Ti and Ni-Cr alloys leads to the redeposition of Y2O3-enriched oxides and also to Zr-rich intermetallic compounds and eutectics.
Titulo: EPMA OF INTERFACES APPLIED TO THE SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL
